main

Class OptimizationMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
      • main.OptimizationMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Object>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.Object>

    public class OptimizationMain
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
    Is the main class require to perform a mapping optimization. In this class the application and architecture objects are instantiated and the optimization phase is performed.
